001package aufgabe4;
002
003/**
004 * Utility class that holds all methods needed for grades.
005 */
006public final class Noten {
007    private Noten() { }
008
009    /**
010     * Best valid grade.
011     */
012    public static final double BESTE = 1.0;
013
014    /**
015     * Worst valid grade.
016     */
017    public static final double SCHLECHTESTE = 5.0;
018
019    /**
020     * Checks if given grade is valid or not.
021     * @param grade to check on.
022     * @return true if grade is valid, false if not.
023     */
024    public static boolean istZulaessig(String grade) {
025        //Überprüfe, ob es eine richtige Note ist
026        if (grade.length() != 3
027                || !Character.isDigit(grade.charAt(0))
028                || (grade.charAt(1) != ',' && grade.charAt(1) != '.')
029                || !Character.isDigit(grade.charAt(2))) {
030            return false;
031        }
032
033        final int beforeComma =
034                Character.getNumericValue(grade.charAt(0));
035        final int afterComma =
036                Character.getNumericValue(grade.charAt(2));
037
038        if (beforeComma < 1
039                || beforeComma > 5) {
040            return false;
041        } else if (((beforeComma == 4
042                || beforeComma == 5)
043                && afterComma != 0)
044                || (afterComma != 0
045                && afterComma != 3
046                && afterComma != 7)) {
047            return false;
048        }
049
050        return true;
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * Transforms grade into double.
055     * @param grade to transform.
056     * @return transformed grade.
057     */
058    public static double toDouble(String grade) {
059        try {
060            grade = grade.replace(',', '.');
061            return Double.parseDouble(grade);
062        } catch (Exception e) {
063            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Diese Note kann nicht zu "
064                    + "einem Double umgewandelt werden: " + grade);
065        }
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Gives grade as String back. If given grade is
070     * not in between 1.0 and 5.0 throw an error.
071     * @param grade to transform.
072     * @return grade as string.
073     */
074    public static String toString(double grade) {
075        if (grade < BESTE || grade > SCHLECHTESTE) {
076            throw new IllegalArgumentException(String.valueOf(grade));
077        }
078
079        return String.format("%.01f", grade);
080    }
081
082    /**
083     * Checks if grade passed.
084     * @param grade to check.
085     * @return false if grade is taller than 5, else true.
086     */
087    public static boolean istBestanden(double grade) {
088        return (grade <= 4);
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * Checks which of the two provided grades is better.
093     * @param grade1 first grade to check.
094     * @param grade2 second grade to check.
095     * @return better grade.
096     */
097    public static double bessere(double grade1, double grade2) {
098        return (grade1 < grade2) ? grade1 : grade2;
099    }
100
101    /**
102     * Checks which of the two provided grades is worse.
103     * @param grade1 first grade to check.
104     * @param grade2 second grade to check.
105     * @return worse grade.
106     */
107    public static double schlechtere(double grade1, double grade2) {
108        return (grade1 > grade2) ? grade1 : grade2;
109    }
110}
